K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313a-35: dge slong ma sum stong ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313a-36: zag pa las ma lus par sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-0: @313b srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-1: 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la de 'dra bar bstan nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-8: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-22: chos la gnas pa'i bde bas bde ba yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:313b-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-0: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong @314a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-1: du mas lha'i rtsva 'jam pa reg na bde ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-2: gos ka tsa lindi ka dang 'dra ba dag tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i lag tu bzhag par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos rtsva de dag blangs te dbang po'i brag gi phug gang na ba der song nas dbang po'i brag gi phug gi nang du phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsva'i gding ba bting ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsva'i gding ba bting ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du mas rtsva'i gding ba'i steng du lha'i gos bting bar gyur te; gos mang po de dag gis dzambu'i gling yongs su gang zhing byur bur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gos mang po de snyed dag kyang 'phang du sor bzhi tsam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te dbang po'i brag gi phug tu gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-7: bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas sil snyan thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-8: me tog gi char dag kyang bab ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-9: me tog gi char de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i brag gi phug tu gshegs nas skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por bsrangs nas dran pa mngon par bzhag ste bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-0: yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan @314b 'das kyis dbang po'i brag gi phug bee d'urya las byas pa lta bur gyur pa de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-1: yang de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa de dag gis dbang po'i brag gi phug na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-4: me long yongs su dag pa'i nang du bzhin snang ba de bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-5: yang de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g-yas pa'i mthil nas 'od zer brgya stong dag btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-6: 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba sems can dag gis mig gis mthong bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-7: yang de'i tshe na sems can thams cad 'dod chags kyi gnod pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-11: gnod 'chab pa med; phrag dog med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-16: de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing pha dang mar 'du shes par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:314b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-0: spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam @315a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-3: de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-5: ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-6: mthong nas lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-7: de'i tshe de dag thams cad kyis kyang lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dag thogs te dbang po'i brag gi phug ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-8: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-9: de dag gtor ma thag tu dbang po'i brag gi phug lan bdun bskor nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315a-10: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po'i brag gi phug tu sprul pa sprul te der bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-0: yang de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa rnyog pa lnga'i tshe 'jig rten du byung bar @315b gyur te; de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang shin tu smad pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-2: da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu ngan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-3: de bzhin du sems can 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-4: zhe sdang gi shas che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-5: gti mug gi shas che ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-7: byas pa mi gzo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-10: dman pa la mos pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag kyang shin tu mthong bar 'dod pa ma yin na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-13: chos bshad pa dgos par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-14: rna ba'ang blags te mi nyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang thabs mkhas pas nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs te sprul pa gzhan dag sprul nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-15: sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad cing bstan pa'i phyir gshegs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-16: de'i phyir sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:315b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:316a-0: skye bo phyi ma dag gi phyir sangs rgyas bgro ba mdzad pa ma gtogs @316a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:316a-1: par gzhan cung zad kyang mdzad pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:316a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ci nas kyang sems can chos 'dod pa dag 'byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:316a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje de dag kyang chos bgro ba mdzad na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338a-38: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338a-41: nam mkha'i ming gi rang bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-6: mi bgrang ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bgrang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-8: gdags su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-9: 'du ba dang 'bral bar bstan cing gzhag mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-14: dam pa ma yin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-16: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-17: mi mnyam pa ma yin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-21: stong pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-22: de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas chos la gus pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i me tog mand'a ras gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-23: me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis steng gi bar snang la gnas med cing yongs su ma btsud bzhin du 'dug par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-24: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-27: me tog 'di dag gang la gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:338b-34: de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mi gnas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-0: mi gnas par nam mkha' la gnas shing nam mkha' las @339a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-8: chos de dag thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-9: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas de'i phyir de dag mi g-yo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-15: khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu cho 'phrul thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-16: khyod sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gro zhing 'ong ba ngo mtshar te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-20: rdzu 'phrul gyis mthu cho 'phrul thob pa'ang ma yin; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos kyang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-23: ma gtogs shing zad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-25: byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-26: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu cho 'phrul thob pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-28: de ltar lha'i bu sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-29: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339a-31: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa grangs med par btsal kyang chos gang yang thob par ma gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-0: byis pa lta @339b bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-9: shed las skyes pa dang; shed bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-15: gang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ma thob pa ma bskyed pa de skyed par byed pas na; lha'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-16: de'i phyir byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-17: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu thob pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-20: rang sangs rgyas rnams ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-21: nyan thos rnams ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-22: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas bgro ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher bshad nas bdag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-24: gang bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ong bar ltas shig bya'o snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:339b-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byin gyi rlabs snga ma de btang ste phyag g-yas pa'i mthil nas 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bu phyung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-0: 'od de la ci nas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog nas lan bdun bskor te 'jam dpal gyi spyi bor nub par 'gyur ba de @340a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-3: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-4: 'di lta bu'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdag gi lus la phog nas spyi bor mi snang bar gyur snyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-5: yang de 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-12: kun tu zhu ba'i phyir 'dong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-13: zab mo zab pa'i chos kyi sgo sgrub pa dag kyang de na 'chad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-14: de dag kyang mnyan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-15: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-17: de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bzhud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340a-18: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems bskyed pa gcig gis ri khor yug gi rtse mo de nas lha'i bu de dag dang bcas te mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @340b de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-1: lha'i bu de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-5: rigs kyi bu mos legs par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-6: zab mo la bzod pa la'ang the tshom ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-7: des bdag kyang snod du gyur par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-10: de ltar glang po chen po dag gi nang nas bdag slad rol tu byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-11: chos bshad pa de 'dra ba las kyang slad rol tu byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-13: sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-14: sa'i phyogs 'di las gang du'ang ma g-yos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:340b-15: gang du'ang ma 'phangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-0: bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba snga dro gcig gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med par mchi zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag @341a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-2: gang de dag gi chos bshad pa de'ang 'dzin cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su zhu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-3: yongs su gsol bar bgyid cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang bdag la zhus pa'i lung ston par mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-7: chos bshad pa gang du'ang bskrad pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par ma 'tshal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas bdag nyid las chos 'chad par bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-11: bdag ri khor yug gi rtse mo de la mchis pa'i tshe chos la 'tshal ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-13: chos la bkur sti bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang cher 'tshal bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-15: yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-16: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-17: bdag 'khor de nas ri khor yug gi rtse mo 'dir 'phangs shing sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-18: ma 'phangs par gyur snyam pa las /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-20: yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni; chos rnams la slob dpon gyis 'chab pa'ang mi mdzad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-22: chags pa'i sems kyang ma mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341a-23: de la bdag nyid kho ru chung du bas sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-0: yang na chos bshad pa @341b 'di la bdag snod du ma gyur pa lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-1: de'i slad du bdag der 'phangs so snyam bgyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-3: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-4: ci'i slad du bdag 'khor 'di nas ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-5: sring mo 'di ma 'phangs par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bshad pa gang du'ang khyod snod du ma gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-12: dus thams cad du pha rol gyis chos spyod pa la lan gdab par mi nus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-13: 'jam dpal; khyod thog ma kho nar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa nas 'byung ba'i tshe 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-14: de ring kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-16: der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:341b-19: chos bstan pa de dag mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o snyam du gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-2: yongs su rtog pa chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas song ste sangs rgyas rnams blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-3: chos kyang mnyan du 'gro'o snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-6: chags pa gsum gyis chags shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-9: sangs rgyas su dmigs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-12: byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la spyod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-13: ma chags pa thob par 'gyur ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la sus kyang shes pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa'i chos gang yang mthong bar nus sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-21: chos rnams chos nyid de la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang blta bar mi bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-24: sems can la ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-26: gal te sems can yongs su grub par gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur blta bar bgyi na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang blta bar nus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas gzhan yang gzigs @342b par 'gyur na; bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-1: gang gi slad du chos thams cad ma skyes pas de'i slad du gang de bzhin gshegs par blta ba de la ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang cung zad kyang gzigs pa ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-6: mthong bar bgyid pa ma lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; 'jam dpal /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-8: mig dang rna ba gang dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba thob par 'dod pa'i mig dang rna ba cung zad kyang yod da /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-11: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas rma ba rmas na cang mi zer par gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pas rmas pa'i lan 'debs ma nus so snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa yongs su mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:342b-18: khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la brnyas pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-1: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-2: zab mo bzod pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-3: gang de bzhin gshegs pas rmra ba rmas pa de'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lan thebs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-7: tshul gang gis na rmas pa'i lan thebs pa lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-12: gal te bdag gis bdag la mig mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-13: bdag la rna ba mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-16: gal te bdag la mig ma mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-17: rna ba ma mchis pa so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-20: rtag pa dang chad par spyod pas chos nyid shes par mi 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-21: chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-25: rtag pa'ang med pa de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-26: mi skye'o; ;gang mi skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-28: zhes de ltar sems shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rmas pa'i lan btab pa 'di yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343a-29: ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drug brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad @343b ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-3: de'i phyir khyod ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-6: sring mo the tshom sel ba 'di ma 'phangs par gyur ces khyod de skad zer ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-8: srid mo 'di zla ba'i 'od kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-10: sangs rgyas dag 'dir gshegs sam ma gshegs she'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-12: mi 'chad cig snyam du mi sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-21: 'du shes dang yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-23: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi chos nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-25: thos nas kyang gzhan la ston par byed mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-27: zhing la zhing du 'du shes pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-28: sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-29: chos la chos su 'du shes pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-30: dge 'dun la dge 'dun du 'du shes pa med; bdag la bdag tu 'du shes pa med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:343b-31: gzhan la gzhan du 'du shes pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-0: gzhal med khang las kyang mi @344a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-1: g-yo la kun tu 'ang snang bar byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-2: thams cad du 'ang bstan mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-4: gang la'ang nye bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-5: 'di la 'od snang bar bya'o; ;'di la 'od mi snang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:344a-8: de bzhin du sring mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la snang bar byed /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-12: rnam par 'phrul pa'i brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhog cing ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming tsam yang sring mo 'dis mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-15: gal te sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-17: mnyam par gzhog pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba'ang mi shes te rmongs par 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gom pa ji ltar 'dor /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:361b-19: ji ltar 'jog mi shes par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-0: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye @362a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-1: shes ni; bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-2: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di ston pa'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdag cag kyang ye shes de dang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' shar phyogs na gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-10: phyogs bcu na yod de; rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'dis sring mo 'di byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-11: sring mo 'di ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rigs kyi bu 'dis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-12: shar phyogs su byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-13: phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362a-15: nga nyid da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-0: rigs kyi bu nga'ang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa ri @362b rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-1: nga ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcur byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-2: de dag da ltar bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-4: dpag tu med pa de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-5: tshig de gsungs ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rna ba'i dbang po la chos kyi rnam grangs grags par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-8: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas kyang ma lhag ma chad par kun bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-10: byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cus ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-11: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-12: dge slong stong phrag bcu bzhis ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-13: zag pa las ma lus par sems rnams par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-14: dge slong ma lnga stong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:362b-16: mi'i skye rgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-0: chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma @363a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-1: dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-4: khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-5: gzhan la'ang rgya cher shod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-8: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-11: ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe spyod par 'gyur bar khyod la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-13: gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-15: gzhes pa ji snyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-16: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-18: yongs su brtag pa bzung na; sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-19: gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag kyang yongs su brtag pa bzung na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-21: rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te slar zhugs par gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363a-22: de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la phyi ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-0: mchod pa byas shing yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang yun de srid du mchod pa byas na byang chub sems dpa' @363b bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-3: bdag gi dpe 'di thos nas sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-4: de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-7: gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-10: kun chub par byed; gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-11: chung du na thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-12: de bas kyang shin tu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-14: nga da mya las 'das nas gang bud med la la zhig gis sring mo the tshom sel ba de'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i de mtshan thos sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-17: chung du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-18: de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-20: tshe 'das nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-21: mi khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-22: tshe rabs kyang dran par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-24: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:363b-25: gzhan yang mngal du mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-2: bud med gang dag bdag cag gi ming thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-3: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-8: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-9: sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-10: lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-063-009:364a-11: dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus /
